name: rotate a by 0, same output as input
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "rotate a by 0, same output as input" do
    expected = "a"
    actual = rotate "a" 0
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: rotate a by 1
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "rotate a by 1" do
    expected = "b"
    actual = rotate "a" 1
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: rotate a by 26, same output as input
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "rotate a by 26, same output as input" do
    expected = "a"
    actual = rotate "a" 26
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: rotate m by 13
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "rotate m by 13" do
    expected = "z"
    actual = rotate "m" 13
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: rotate n by 13 with wrap around alphabet
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "rotate n by 13 with wrap around alphabet" do
    expected = "a"
    actual = rotate "n" 13
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: rotate capital letters
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "rotate capital letters" do
    expected = "TRL"
    actual = rotate "OMG" 5
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: rotate spaces
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "rotate spaces" do
    expected = "T R L"
    actual = rotate "O M G" 5
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: rotate numbers
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "rotate numbers" do
    expected = "Xiwxmrk 1 2 3 xiwxmrk"
    actual = rotate "Testing 1 2 3 testing" 4
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: rotate punctuation
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "rotate punctuation" do
    expected = "Gzo'n zvo, Bmviyhv!"
    actual = rotate "Let's eat, Grandma!" 21
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual

name: rotate all letters
test_code:
verify do
  labeled "rotate all letters" do
    expected = "Gur dhvpx oebja sbk whzcf bire gur ynml qbt."
    actual = rotate "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog." 13
    label "expected" expected
    label "actual" actual
    ensureEqual expected actual
